channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 解说：恒大可能面临清算以及接下来会发生什么
item.description: A key offshore bondholder group of China Evergrande plans to join a petition to liquidate the developer at a hearing in a Hong Kong court on Monday, Reuters reported this week.翻译:据路透社本周报道，中国恒大的一个主要离岸债券持有人集团计划在周一香港法院的听证会上加入清算该开发商的请愿书。

item.title: 迪拜房地产热潮显示出消退迹象
item.description: As cranes speckle the Dubai skyline and ultra-luxury homes change hands at record prices, signs that the city-state's property boom is fizzling out are coming into view.翻译:随着起重机点缀迪拜的天际线，超豪华住宅以创纪录的价格易手，这个城市国家的房地产热潮正在消退的迹象开始显现。
item.author: Sinead Cruise, Iain Withers, Hadeel Sayegh

item.title: 中国各省份在未能实现之前的目标后，制定了 2024 年温和增长的目标
item.description: Many provinces in China including the financial hub of Shanghai have set modest 2024 economic growth targets after missing their previous goals, in a sign that a nationwide recovery to pre-pandemic levels would yet again prove elusive this year.翻译:包括金融中心上海在内的中国许多省份在未能实现之前的目标后，都设定了适度的 2024 年经济增长目标，这表明今年全国范围内恢复到大流行前水平的情况将再次难以实现。
item.author: Ellen Zhang, Ryan Woo

item.title: 气候受到威胁的图瓦卢举行选举，中国台湾关注
item.description: Voting began on Friday in the tiny Pacific Island nation of Tuvalu in a national election that is being closely watched by China, Taiwan, the US and its ally Australia, amid a tussle for influence in the region.翻译:周五，太平洋小岛国图瓦卢的全国选举投票开始，中国、台湾、美国及其盟友澳大利亚都在密切关注这场选举，以争夺该地区的影响力。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 瑞士信贷前亚太区资产管理主管退出瑞银 - 消息人士
item.description: Former asset management head of Credit Suisse in Asia Pacific, Min Huang, is leaving UBS as the bank embarks on reviewing its China business post global leadership changes, three sources with knowledge of the matter said.翻译:三位知情人士称，瑞信亚太区前资产管理主管黄敏将离开瑞银，因为瑞银在全球领导层变动后开始审查其中国业务。
item.author: Selena Li, Yu Xie

item.title: 亚洲股市有望每周上涨；关注美国通胀测试
item.description: Asian shares were set on Friday to snap a three-week losing streak, while investors awaited a key reading on U.S. inflation later in the day to gauge the outlook for U.S. rates.翻译:亚洲股市周五将结束连续三周的下跌，而投资者则等待当天晚些时候公布的美国通胀关键数据，以评估美国利率前景。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 白宫沙利文将在曼谷会见中国外交部长
item.description: U.S. National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan will meet with Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi in Bangkok on Friday and Saturday, building on a commitment by the two countries' leaders to deepen dialogue between the world's two largest economies.翻译:美国国家安全顾问杰克·沙利文将于周五和周六在曼谷会见中国外交部长王毅，以两国领导人深化世界两个最大经济体之间对话的承诺为基础。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，中国敦促伊朗遏制胡塞武装在红海的袭击
item.description: Chinese officials have asked their Iranian counterparts to help rein in attacks on ships in the Red Sea by the Iran-backed Houthis, or risk harming business relations with Beijing, four Iranian sources and a diplomat familiar with the matter said.翻译:四名伊朗消息人士和一名知情外交官表示，中国官员已要求伊朗同行帮助制止伊朗支持的胡塞武装在红海对船只的袭击，否则可能会损害与北京的商业关系。
item.author: Parisa Hafezi, Andrew Hayley

item.title: 主要客户Avolon表示，波音生产困境“将得到解决”
item.description: Boeing's production difficulties will "get resolved", its 737 MAX 10 aircraft will get certified and the impact of U.S. regulators freezing a planned production ramp-up will be minimal this year, the head of major customer Avolon said.翻译:主要客户Avolon的负责人表示，波音公司的生产困难将“得到解决”，其737 MAX 10飞机将获得认证，美国监管机构今年冻结计划的产量提升的影响将很小。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 路透调查显示全球经济前景与激进降息预期不一致
item.description: Global growth is set to stay resilient this year and only pick up pace a bit in 2025, according to a Reuters poll of economists, a stable outlook at odds with still-relatively aggressive interest rate cut bets in financial markets.翻译:路透社对经济学家的一项调查显示，今年全球经济增长将保持弹性，到 2025 年只会略有加快，稳定的前景与金融市场仍然相对激进的降息押注相矛盾。
item.author: Hari Kishan

item.title: 早间竞价：全球欢呼提升周五的感觉
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 中国音乐学生因威胁民主活动人士在美国被判有罪
item.description: A Chinese music student was convicted on Thursday of U.S. charges that he harassed an activist who posted fliers at the Berklee College of Music in Boston supporting democracy in China and threatened to report her activities to Chinese law enforcement.翻译:周四，一名中国音乐学生因美国指控骚扰一名在波士顿伯克利音乐学院张贴支持中国民主传单的活动人士而被定罪，并威胁要向中国执法部门举报她的活动。
item.author: Nate Raymond

item.title: 亚斯特雷姆斯卡很高兴在澳大利亚公开赛结束后避免资格赛
item.description: Dayana Yastremska did not feel too dejected by her semi-final defeat at the Australian Open as she knows her run would have boosted her rankings so that she can get direct entry into tournaments rather than playing in the qualifiers.翻译:达亚娜·雅斯特雷姆斯卡并没有因为澳大利亚网球公开赛半决赛的失利而感到太沮丧，因为她知道自己的跑步会提高她的排名，这样她就可以直接参加比赛，而不是参加预选赛。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国恒大集团出售全部资产股权以削减债务
item.description: China Evergrande said on Thursday one of its units had entered a deal to sell its entire stake in Shantou Hengmeng Property Development for 137.6 million yuan ($19.20 million).翻译:中国恒大周四表示，旗下子公司已达成协议，以 1.376 亿元人民币（1,920 万美元）的价格出售其在汕头恒盟房地产开发公司的全部股权。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 萨巴伦卡力压高夫晋级澳网决赛对阵郑智
item.description: Aryna Sabalenka continued her confident march towards a second successive Australian Open crown with a 7-6(2) 6-4 victory over Coco Gauff in a blockbuster semi-final on Thursday to set up a title-decider against Chinese 12th seed Zheng Qinwen.翻译:周四，萨巴伦卡在半决赛中以 7-6(2) 6-4 击败可可·高夫，继续自信地迈向澳网连续第二冠，与中国 12 号种子郑钦文争夺冠军。
item.author: Shrivathsa Sridhar, Sonali Paul

item.title: 意大利揭露与中国影子银行网络有关的19亿美元欺诈案
item.description: Italian police said on Thursday they had uncovered a tax fraud carried out by 85 suspects involving 1.7 billion euros ($1.9 billion) in false invoices, with the money laundered through a system of so-called Chinese shadow banks.翻译:意大利警方周四表示，他们发现了 85 名嫌疑人实施的税务欺诈，涉及 17 亿欧元（19 亿美元）的虚假发票，这些资金通过所谓的中国影子银行系统进行洗钱。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国选手郑在澳大利亚网球公开赛上首次进入大满贯决赛
item.description: China's Zheng Qinwen ended the fairytale run of qualifier Dayana Yastremska at the Australian Open with a 6-4 6-4 victory on Thursday to reach her first Grand Slam final, where she will face defending champion Aryna Sabalenka.翻译:周四，中国选手郑沁文以6-4 6-4战胜澳大利亚网球公开赛预选赛选手达亚娜·雅斯特雷姆斯卡(Dayana Yastremska)的童话般的胜利，首次进入大满贯决赛，她将对阵卫冕冠军萨巴伦卡(Aryna Sabalenka)。
item.author: Sonali Paul

item.title: 主教获教宗批准在中国祝圣，中美关系明显解冻
item.description: A bishop appointed by Pope Francis was installed in a diocese in China on Thursday, the Vatican said, in an apparent thaw in relations following friction when government-backed bishops were named without papal permission.翻译:梵蒂冈表示，周四，由教皇方济各任命的一位主教在中国的一个教区就任，由于政府支持的主教在未经教皇许可的情况下被任命，由此引发的摩擦导致两国关系明显解冻。
item.author: Philip Pullella

item.title: 墨尔本半场失利后，高夫受伤，但为青少年的成就感到自豪
item.description: Coco Gauff will take plenty of positives out of her last Grand Slam campaign as a teenager once the pain of her loss to Aryna Sabalenka in a thrilling Australian Open semi-final fades.翻译:一旦在惊心动魄的澳大利亚网球公开赛半决赛中输给阿琳娜·萨巴伦卡的痛苦消退，可可·高夫将从她十几岁的最后一次大满贯赛事中获得很多积极的东西。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: ASML首席执行官表示欧洲将无法实现2030年芯片市场目标
item.description: Europe will miss its goal of raising its share of the global computer chip market to 20% by 2030 because it is not building manufacturing capacity fast enough, semiconductor equipment maker ASML CEO Peter Wennink said.翻译:半导体设备制造商 ASML 首席执行官 Peter Wennink 表示，欧洲将无法实现到 2030 年将全球计算机芯片市场份额提高到 20% 的目标，因为其制造能力建设速度不够快。
item.author: Toby Sterling
